Literature.Title: Development of Antibacterial Peptides with Membrane Disruption and Folate Pathway Inhibitory Activities against Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Li C, Zhou Z, Wang W, Zhao Y,  Meng Y, Zhao P, Wang M, Liu X, Wang X, Wang S, Ren B, Zhang L, Xia X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>320 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>320 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:50% Cell death=>320 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 5314(MIC=6µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC UA159(MIC=12µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=6µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325-4(MIC=6µM),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(MIC=12µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>48µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>48µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=3-6µM)
